TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlnsPrefixAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlnsPrefixAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlnsPrefixAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 識別在 XAML 檔案中撰寫項目和屬性 (序列化) 時，或與具有 XAML 編輯功能的設計環境互動時，要與 XAML 用法的 XAML 命名空間關聯的建議前置詞。

span.span: Identifies a recommended prefix to associate with a XAML namespace for XAML usage, when writing elements and attributes in a XAML file (serialization) or when interacting with a design environment that has XAML editing features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 處理器或併入 XAML 或執行 XAML 序列化任何處理程序的架構類型通常會接受建議的前置詞。XAML processors or frameworks that incorporate XAML, or any process that performs XAML serialization, should generally honor the recommended prefix. 前置詞可能需要在任何情況下在其中從原始 XAML 來源中的特定對應的前置詞是不以某種方式保留在執行階段物件圖形或否則儲存由 framework 或技術。The prefix might be necessary in any case where prefixes from specific mappings in the original XAML source are not somehow preserved in the runtime object graph or otherwise stored by a framework or technology. Framework 可能必須如何序列化忽略建議的前置詞，從它自己組件; 其本身類型的特定喜好設定這可能會以一致的方式升級預設 XAML 命名空間來完成。A framework might have specific preferences for how to serialize its own types that ignore the recommended prefix from its own assemblies; this might be done to consistently promote a default XAML namespace. 不過，這類架構應該仍可能協力廠商架構和工具使用方式，其 XAML 類型提供建議的前置詞。However, such a framework should still provide recommended prefixes for possible third-party and tool usages of its XAML types. 請參閱 「 最佳做法的 XAML 設計工具支援或一般序列化 」 一節。See "Best Practice for XAML Designer Support or General Serialization" section below. 前置詞的一般建議是使用短字串，因為前置詞通常會套用至所有已序列化的項目來自 XAML 命名空間。A general recommendation for prefixes is to use short strings, because the prefix is typically applied to all serialized elements that come from the XAML namespace. 前置詞字串長度可以有明顯的影響，序列化的 XAML 輸出的大小。The prefix string length can have a noticeable effect on the size of serialized XAML output. 如果所要求的前置詞已經由另一個先前遇到/序列化 XAML 命名空間識別項使用中，則行為是未指定 （行為是根據每個個別的 XAML 處理器實作）。If a prefix being requested is already in use by another previously encountered/serialized XAML namespace identifier, the behavior is unspecified (behavior is up to each individual XAML processor implementation). 在大部分情況下，您要套用才也套用至少一個該相同的 XAML 命名空間的組件。In most cases, you apply only if you have also applied at least one in the assembly for that same XAML namespace. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## XAML 設計工具支援或一般序列化的最佳作法Best Practice for XAML Designer Support or General Serialization 即使您想要在大部分的使用方式情況下，您的架構或程式庫的預設 XAML 命名空間相關聯的 XAML 命名空間，您仍應該當做 XML 命名空間的建議前置詞來指定非空白字串。Even if you intend the associated XAML namespace to be the default XAML namespace in most usage cases for your framework or library, you should still specify a non-empty string as the recommended prefix for a XAML namespace. 在個別的 XAML 檔案和 XAML 節點資料流中，會執行預設 XAML 命名空間資訊。Default XAML namespace information is carried in individual XAML files and XAML node streams. 預設 XAML 命名空間以及它在指定的 XAML 來源的定義方式可以輕鬆地址的每個案例序列化不使用。The default XAML namespace and how it is defined in a given XAML source can easily be perpetuated for per-case serialization without using . 不過，就 XAML 作者已選擇將預設 XAML 命名空間對應至其他項目很有用。However, the is useful for cases where the XAML author has chosen to map the default XAML namespace to something else. 在此案例中的 XAML 文字編輯器內嵌在設計環境可以使用做為初始的 XAML 命名空間的提示`xmlns`對應。In this scenario a XAML text editor embedded in a design environment can use as a hint for an initial XAML namespace `xmlns` mapping. 或者設計環境可以加入在 just-in-time 對應來支援 XAML 的設計象徵物，例如將物件從 [工具箱] 移至視覺化設計介面。Or a design environment can add just-in-time mappings to the backing XAML for design metaphors such as dragging objects out of a toolbox and into a visual design surface. 此外，它會傳入了設計工具無法同時支援多個啟用 XAML 的架構，以及具有常見的 XAML 序列化程式所使用的.NET Framework XAML 服務，而非特定 framework 的序列化。Also, it is conceivable that a designer could simultaneously support multiple XAML-enabling frameworks, and has a common XAML serializer that relies on .NET Framework XAML Services rather than framework-specific serialization. 指定這些案例可協助讓 XAML 用法類型的更可攜式和強固如果 XAML 設計工具之間交換或進行其他取用者標記編譯器例如 XAML 編輯器之間來回或其他序列化。Specifying a for these scenarios helps make the XAML usage for your types more portable and robust if the XAML is exchanged between design tools, or undergoes a round trip between XAML editors and other consumers such as markup compilers or other serialization.
